meanings.definition: Not causing or capable of causing death.
meanings.sent1: The foam darts used in the game are nonlethal.
meanings.sent2: The tranquilizer dart is a nonlethal way to sedate animals.
meanings.sent3: The nonlethal water gun fight at the party was a blast.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a nonlethal weapon, disarming everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The nonlethal nature of the medicine made it safe for children.

meanings.definition: Not involving or resulting in death.
meanings.sent1: The nonlethal training exercises prepared the soldiers for real missions.
meanings.sent2: The use of tear gas is considered nonlethal in crowd control.
meanings.sent3: The nonlethal prank involved a fake spider, causing a lot of laughter.
meanings.sent4: His nonlethal mistake in the game cost his team the victory.
meanings.sent5: The nonlethal impact of the fall left him with only a bruise.
